original_text: As if a man did flee from a lion, and a bear met him; or went into the house, and leaned his hand on the wall, and a serpent bit him.
korean_text: 마치 사람이 사자를 피하다가 곰을 만나거나 혹은 집에 들어가서 손을 벽에 대었다가 뱀에게 물림 같도다

sentences.original_text: As if a man did flee from a lion
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 한 사람이 사자에게서 도망하는 것 같으며

sentences.original_text: and leaned his hand on the wall
